titles.title: Gädlä Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus “Vita of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus” / Täʾamrä Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus “Miracles of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus” / Mälkǝʾa Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus “Image of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus”

shortcontents.shortcontent: I) Gädlä Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus “Vita of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus” (fols. 4ra-94ra) II) Täʾamrä Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus “Miracles of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus”: 13 miracles (fols. 94ra-112ra) III) Mälkǝʾa Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus “Image of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus” (fols. 112rb-116rb)

donors.donor: Gäbrä Yoḥannǝs and Wälättä Täklä Haymanot are mentioned as commissioners on fols. 68rb and 112ra and in many supplication formulas. Besides, the following names are written in supplications: Wäldä Mikaʾel, Wälättä Sänbät and Wälättä Śǝllase (fols. 68rb, 898vb, 95vb).

txstates.txstate: The leather cover is damaged at the spine Fols. 55, 56, 73 have been enlarged by sewing a piece of parchment onto them (at the bottom or side margin). Tear amended on fol. 70.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the dark brown leather cover (five tools were used: triple line fillet, double circle, x-form, interlaced double sine wave, Maltese cross).

bnothers.bnother: Two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover. Quire XV is reinforced with a parchment guard, inserted into the centre fold.

squires.squire: A(3; s.l.: 2, stub before 3/fols. 1r-3v) – I(8/fols. 4r-11v) – II(8/fols. 12r-19v) – III(8/fols. 20r-27v) – IV(8/fols. 28r-35v) – V(8/fols. 36r-43v) – VI(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 44r-51v) – VII(8/fols. 52r-59v) – VIII(8/fols. 60r-67v) – IX(8/fols. 68r-75v) – X(8/fols. 76r-83v) – XI(8/fols. 84r-91v) – XII(8/fols. 92r-99v) – XIII(8/fols. 100r-107v) – XIV(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 108r-115v) – XV(3; s.l.: 2, no stub/fols. 116r-118v)

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling. Some leaves have one (fols. 79v-80r, 83rv, 92r-93v, 100rv, 103r-104v, 107r-108v, 115rv) or two (fols. 60rv, 67rv, 87r-88v, 98r-99v) additional bottom ruled lines not used by the scribe.

rubrications.rubrication:
Nomina sacra; names of the protagonist and of other characters like Mikaʾel and Gäbrǝʾel (fols. 5va, 18vb, 28rab etc.); names of the commissioners; elements of the punctuation signs and of the text dividers; elements of Ethiopic numerals.
Several groups of lines on the incipit page of Text I and in the incipit of Text II (alternating with black lines); two initial lines in the incipit of Text III; several groups of lines in the incipit of a section of Text I (dǝrsan, alternating with black lines); one to three initial lines of sections of Text I, two initial lines of sections of Text II (miracles), initial word or its abbreviation of each stanza of Text III.

abbreviations.abbreviation:
ዓለ፡ ዓ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fol. 102rb) ዓለ፡ አ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fol. 88vb) ለዓ፡ ዓ፡ አ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fol. 96vb ለዓ፡ ዓለ፡ አ(ሜን)፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fols. 95vb, 101rb, 107ra, 108vb) ዓለ፡ ዓ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fol. 102rb) ለዓለ፡ ዓ፡ አ(ሜን)፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fols. 98vb, 105rb) ለዓለ፡ ዓለ፡ አ(ሜን)፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fols. 100vb, 108ra)
አ፡ for አሜን፡ (fols. 111va-112rb) ሰ(ላ)፡ for ሰላም፡ (fols. 112va-115vb)

otherdetails.otherdetail: Text I includes the Dǝrsanä Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus, Homily on Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus, and four miracles in life (68va-94ra). Text II is followed by blessings for those who gathered to listen to the Vita and Miracles of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus” (fol. 111va-112rb).

extras.extra: - Omitted letters and words written interlineally: e.g., fols. 6vb, 13ra, 13va, 17ra, 18ra, 23vb, 39ra, 42ra, 56vb (margin), 69vb, 76vb, 84rb (margin), 111ra. - Tämälläs-signs (in the shape of +) indicating the place where the omissions, written in the margins, belong: fols. 38rb, 83rb, 84vb. - Signs in red ink marking certain text passages on fols. 26v, 37r, 39r, 40r, 44v, 71v, 76v, 79r, 84v, 85r, 89r, 90r, 114v. - Spaces for rubricated names (of the commissioners) are left unfilled: fols. 4ra, 5ra, 16vb. - Scribbles: fols. 1r, 28r.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Monthly readings of Texts I-II are indicated by the names of the months written in frames, in the upper margin: ጥር: fol. 4r የካቲት: fol. 10r, effaced but still readable የካቲት: fol. 15va, in red ሚያዝያ: fol. 23rb, partly over erasure in red <...>: fol. 27vb, effaced ግንቦት: fol. 29va, in red <...>: fol. 33va, erased ሰኔ: fol. 36va, secondary hand ሐምሌ: fol. 42va, secondary hand ነሐሴ: fol. 48vb, secondary hand <...>: fol. 51ra, erased መጋቢት: fol. 54r ጥቅምት: fol. 74ra, secondary hand ኅዳር: fol. 77vb, secondary hand ታኅሣሥ: fol. 83vb, secondary hand erased: fol. 87vb መጋቢት: fol. 88vb መጋቢት: fol. 108vb, in pen.
